subject: Re: [junit] Having problem with Test Suite - Will you please help me
msgSnippet: Thanks Jeff: I agree with you point 2 and 3. But not on point 1: 1. Your suite class should not extend TestCase ... I have fixed the code already and running
messageBody:
Thanks Jeff:
I agree with you point 2 and 3. But not on point 1:>
1. Your suite class should not extend TestCase
>
I have fixed the code already and running smoothly.
Thanks for your reply.
--- Jeff Nielsen <jeff.nielsen@...>
wrote:
> 1. Your suite class should not extend TestCase
>
> 2. The signature of the suite method should be
> "public static Test suite()"
> with a lower-case "s".
>
> 3. Your main method should call
> junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite())
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "balakrishnan sengodan" <bsengodan@...>
> To: <junit@yahoogroups.com>
> Sent: Sunday, July 20, 2003 12:17 PM
> Subject: [junit] Having problem with Test Suite -
> Will you please help me
>
>
> > Hello All:
> > I have created two test classes: AccountJU and
> > TestGame and tested them individually. I have
> created
> > another suite class AllTest.class and added the
> above
> > two classes to the suite. Unfortunately I am
> getting
> > the following error.
> > I know I am making mistakes. But i do not know
> how to
> > figure it iut. Will any one please help me to fix
> > this.
> >
> > Error Message:
> > ==============
> > .F
> > Time: 0.01
> > There was 1 failure:
> > 1)
> >
>
warning(junit.framework.TestSuite$1)junit.framework.AssertionFailedError:
> > No tests found in AllTests
> > at AllTests.main(AllTests.java:9)
> >
> > FAILURES!!!
> > Tests run: 1, Failures: 1, Errors: 0
> >
> >
> >
> > The code:
> > ========
> > import junit.framework.*;
> >
> > public class AllTest extends TestCase {
> >
> > public static void main(String[] args) {
> > junit.textui.TestRunner.run(new
> > TestSuite(AllTest.class));
> > }
> >
> > public static Test Suite() {
> > TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();
> >
> > suite.addTest(new
> TestSuite(AccountJU.class));
> > suite.addTest(new
> TestSuite(TestGame.class));
> > return suite;
> > }
> >
> > } // End of class
> >
> >
